title: Senior Business Analyst - Mobile and Web Application
description:
We are seeking a seasoned Senior Business Analyst with a focus on Mobile and Web Applications to join our dynamic team.

The ideal candidate will leverage their deep expertise in business analysis, requirement gathering, and agile methodologies to drive improvements and deliver cutting-edge solutions across mobile and web platforms.

Responsibilities



Gather, structure, and document requirements for web and mobile applications
Apply working knowledge of APIs and agile methodologies such as scrum to enhance project execution
Take a proactive role in stakeholder coordination, including conducting discovery sessions and Quarterly Business Reviews
Demonstrate a go-getter attitude combined with an analytical aptitude to dive deep into new concepts
Coordinate and refine product, insurance concepts, and roadmap requirements across multiple teams
Engage with application stakeholders such as Product Owners and Technical Architects for impact analysis
Manage product backlog, refine requirements, and ensure user stories are well described and meet acceptance criteria
Validate and support testing of solutions post-development
Prioritize tasks effectively to lay a strong foundation for implementation



Requirements



7-10 years of relevant experience in business analysis
Proficiency in gathering requirements specifically for web and mobile applications
Expertise in agile framework use and participation in scrum teams
Qualifications in managing stakeholder relationships and coordinating business reviews
Background in insurance concepts and application impact analysis
Competency in validating/testing solutions and managing product backlogs
